name: aquel cartón sobre un motor, años más tarde / ii
description:
this is the polycircles system, with specific parameters that draw everything as lines, with a large thickness parameter.

this drew me to think about a contraption we had as little kids, a motor where we would stick a cardboard to draw with markers as the motor spinned the cardboard. I'm sure (and hope) many of us have played with something similar. I never thought back then to place the cardboard again sticking it in a different point to the motor axis. If we had done this as kids, we might have gotten something like this drawing.

Here's to experimenting and letting your senses & history & self tell you what it means to you. I hope it means something to someone else too.

Artwork by Marcelo Soria-Rodríguez, @msoriaro.

Made with Processing, 3500x2000 png.
